tags.description:
In a separate house there are showers and toilets, kitchen with refrigerator, stove. Coffee machine, drinking water are also available.
Catering services are also offered in the camping. Guests have access to a barbecue, chairs and a table.
tags.name: Kempings "Daugavas lokos"
tags.note:
LV: Namiņi, Glempings, Telšu vietas, Kemperu vietas, Pirts, Kubli
Nomas: Laivu, Plostu, SUP dēļu, Elektrovelosipēdu noma

ENG: Holiday houses, Glemping, Tent, Camper spaces, Sauna, Hot tubs
Rentals: Boats, Rafts, SUP, E-Bike rentals

tags.description: In one of the most beautiful places in Latvia, on the bank of Daugava river, is located the new Glemping “Daugavas lokos”. Bell tents (glemping (brand Nordisk)) are located directly between Daugavpils and Kraslava – in the Slutiski village.
tags.name: Glempings "Daugavas lokos"
